item.title: Powerful Pro Baseball 2024-2025 shipments and digital sales top one million
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • Switch

First game in the series to ever surpass one million units.

Total shipments and digital sales for Powerful Pro Baseball 2024-2025 have surpassed one million units as of December 18, Konami announced. It is the first game in the series to ever surpass one million units.

Powerful Pro Baseball 2024-2025 first launched for PlayStation 4 and Switch on July 18, 2024 in Japan in celebration of the baseball series’ 30th anniversary.

From today until January 22, 2026, the digital version of Powerful Pro Baseball 2024-2025 will be available at a 50 percent-off discount price of 4,235 yen.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/powerful-pro-baseball-2024-2025-shipments-and-digital-sales-top-one-million
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: PATAPON 1+2 REPLAY ‘Boss Rush Challenge’ update now available
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

How far can you go?

Publisher Bandai Namco and developer SAS have have released a free update for PATAPON 1+2 REPLAY, which adds the new “Boss Rush Challenge” mode, the companies announced.

Here is an overview of the mode, via Bandai Namco:

Take on wave after wave of powerful bosses with the squad you’ve grown. The unit you take into battle uses your cleared save data. Form the strongest squad to take on each boss. Each stage brings a boss that changes randomly every time! With every stage, bosses grow stronger and appear in even greater numbers! If your Patapons face an unbeatable foe, power up your Patapon squad through battles and training! Rally your Patapons for the ultimate final battle! Your Mighty power will be put to the test…! Patapons… at Battle End, what will you see?

PATAPON 1+2 REPLAY is available now for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

“Boss Rush Challenge” Update Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/patapon-12-replay-boss-rush-challenge-update-now-available

item.title: Octopath Traveler series sales top six million
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Octopath Traveler I and II currently on sale for 60 percent-off.

Total sales for the Octopath Traveler series have surpassed six million units worldwide, Square Enix announced.

The latest entry in the series, Octopath Traveler 0, launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on December 4 worldwide.

Octopath Traveler and Octopath Traveler II are also for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC. The digital versions of these two titles are currently available at a 60 percent-off discount price until December 23.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/octopath-traveler-series-sales-top-six-million

item.title: Digimon Story: Time Stranger DLC ‘Additional Digimon & Episode Pack 2’ launches in January 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Short teaser trailer released.

Digimon Story: Time Stranger downloadable content “Additional Digimon & Episode Pack 2: Nabiku GAKU-RAN” (English title to be announced) will launch in January 2026, publisher Bandai Namco and developer Media.Vision announced. It will be available to users who have purchased the Deluxe or Ultimate Editions, or can be purchased separately or through the Season Pass.

Digimon Story: Time Stranger is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.

Watch a teaser trailer below.

DLC “Additional Digimon & Episode Pack 2: Nabiku GAKU-RAN” Teaser Trailer

(Teaser trailer from 9:18 to 9:45.)



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/digimon-story-time-stranger-dlc-additional-digimon-episode-pack-2-launches-in-january-2026
